page.title: 18Religion
page.content: The Anglican churches of Culpho, playford and Bealings are served by a Rector living at Little Bealings Rectory and his curate. Culpho Church has one service a month, the others have one, sometimes two, services each sunday. Gt Bealings church is floodlit on occasions such as a visit from the bishop of St Edmundsbury & Ipswich. Rushmere Baptist church has two services every Sunday and a full-time pastor. 70 members and 100 children are connected with this church in its small premises, its Bible study group, women's and youth fellowship. The narest Roman Catholic church is just to the south of kesgrave, methodist and United Reormed churches in Woodbridge and Ipswich. The nearest synagogue is in Colchester. United States Air Force servicement hold a bible study session in a housel
